name: Estimated costs of deferred projects to construct or repair and renovate science and engineering research space in academic institutions, by field and type of project: FY 2023
description: Estimated costs of deferred projects to construct or repair and renovate science and engineering research space in academic institutions, by field and type of project: FY 2023

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: field_included_in_institutional_plans_repair_or_renovate
variableMeasured.description: Included In Institutional Plans Repair Or Renovate

variableMeasured.name: field_not_included_in_institutional_plans_construct
variableMeasured.description: Not Included In Institutional Plans Construct

variableMeasured.name: field_not_included_in_institutional_plans_repair_or_renovate
variableMeasured.description: Not Included In Institutional Plans Repair Or Renovate

notes: Deferred projects are those that (1) are not funded and (2) are not scheduled for FY 2024 or FY 2025. Details may not add to totals due to rounding.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, Survey of Science and Engineering Research Facilities, FY 2023.
